items.title: Dauntless
items.shortDescription: A free-to-play, co-op action RPG with gameplay similar to Monster Hunter.

items.title: World of Tanks
items.shortDescription: If you like blowing up tanks, with a quick and intense game style you will love this game!

items.title: Warframe
items.shortDescription: A cooperative free-to-play third person online action shooter set in an stunning sci-fi world.

items.title: CRSED: F.O.A.D.
items.shortDescription: Take the battle royale genre and add  mystical powers and you have CRSED: F.O.A.D. (Aka Cuisine Royale: Second Edition)

items.title: Crossout
items.shortDescription: A post-apocalyptic MMO vehicle combat game!

items.title: Blade and Soul
items.shortDescription: A free-to-play martial arts MMORPG that tasks players with learning combination attacks.

items.title: Armored Warfare
items.shortDescription: A modern team-based MMO tank game from Obsidian Entertainment.

items.title: Trove
items.shortDescription: A free to play Sandbox massively multiplayer online role-playing game!

items.title: World of Warships
items.shortDescription: A 3D free to play naval action-themed MMO from the creators of World of Tanks!

items.title: ArcheAge
items.shortDescription: A free-to-play, hybrid fantasy/sandbox MMORPG brought to you by Trion Worlds.
